userStory.what: sponsor a summit that matches my brand
userStory.why: I can get exposure to potential customers and otherwise tout my Drupal credentials

question.descricao: Does the user story involve some token?
Does the user story implementation involve some session token?

requirements.descricao: If authenticators permit users to remain logged in, verify that re-authentication occurs periodically both when actively used or after an idle period. ([C6](https://owasp.org/www-project-proactive-controls/#div-numbering))

question.descricao: Does the user story implementation involve any sensitive transactions, data, or API?
Does the user story implementation involve any sensitive transactions or account modification?

requirements.descricao: Verify the application ensures a full, valid login session or requires re-authentication or secondary verification before allowing any sensitive transactions or account modifications.

question.descricao: Does the user story implementation involve using any sensitive data or API ?

requirements.descricao: Verify that sensitive data is sent to the server in the HTTP message body or headers, and that query string parameters from any HTTP verb do not contain sensitive data.
